description:
Chess tactic trainer based on https://database.lichess.org/#puzzles.

Tactic Trainer

Tactic Trainer is an advanced chess training application designed to help players of all levels improve their tactical skills. With a comprehensive set of features, Tactic Trainer offers an engaging and effective way to practice and master chess tactics.

Key Features:

  • Interactive Chessboard: The app features an interactive chessboard that allows users to solve puzzles and practice moves directly on the board.
  • Extensive Puzzle Library: Access a vast library (100k puzzles) of chess puzzles ranging from 1600 to 3000 levels. Each puzzle is designed to challenge and improve your tactical thinking.
  • Puzzle Categories: Puzzles are categorized by themes such as openings, middlegame tactics, and endgames.
  • Detailed Puzzle Information: Each puzzle comes with detailed information, including the position, moves, rating, and tags, providing context and helping users understand the tactical themes.
  • Performance Tracking: Track your progress with detailed statistics and performance metrics. See how you improve over time and identify areas that need more practice.
  • User-Friendly Interface: The app features a clean and intuitive interface, making it easy to navigate and use for players of all ages.
  • Offline Access: Puzzles can be practiced offline, ensuring you can train your tactics anytime, anywhere.
  • Regular Updates: The app is regularly updated with new puzzles and features, ensuring a fresh and engaging experience.

Whether you are a beginner looking to learn the basics or an advanced player aiming to sharpen your skills, Tactic Trainer provides the tools and resources you need to become a better chess player. Download Tactic Trainer today and start your journey to mastering chess tactics!
